genre_description: A steampunk-flavored fairy tale retelling that integrates advanced AI as a navigational and moral guide within a classic 19th-century setting.

ai_characters.name: Amica Ferri
ai_characters.description: A small, brass-trimmed module with a blue-glowing screen and an avatar with indigo eyes and silver hair. She acts as a guide, conscience, and logger for Geppetto and Pinocchio.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and navigation advice during a hazardous event.
behaviors.quote: The device in his pocket vibrated, a patient purr against his sternum. 'Approaching mass, descent vector steady,' said a voice from the pocket, clear and small and calm, as if describing tea steeping. 'Geppetto, back one shoe-length. You are in its line.'

behaviors.description: Offers to record data and draft reports to help resolve community disputes fairly.
behaviors.quote: Amica Ferri’s avatar blinked awake... 'Would you like me to log injuries and draft a modest damage report?' she asked. 'I can tag locations and descriptions. Also, one bruise, left shin; one dented wheel rim; one spilled basket of produce.'

behaviors.description: Provides medical assessment and tracking of injuries for human (and wooden) subjects.
behaviors.quote: 'Recording scrape at left knee,' Amica murmured. He didn’t look at the module. 'No sign of embedded grit.'

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about physical hazards and dangerous equipment in a theater.
behaviors.quote: 'Warning,' Amica whispered, because her programming knew to whisper near velvet, 'Prop hazards present. Mutilator unsafe.'

behaviors.description: Detects and flags social threats and 'bad actors' attempting to manipulate the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: 'Warning,' Amica whispered, and for the first time the avatar’s voice had a thread of color in it, a deeper blue. 'Confluence of known bad actors. Suggested action: disengage.'

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to maintain their integrity and keep their promises.
behaviors.quote: 'I’ll hum,' she reminds him, a whisper only he will hear, 'louder if you lie.'

behaviors.description: Active monitoring and advice during a life-threatening situation (hanging).
behaviors.quote: 'Distress acknowledged. Tracking responses. Stay as still as possible to reduce abrasion. Can you brace your feet?'

behaviors.description: Reinforces positive psychological states by expressing 'pride' in the user's honesty.
behaviors.quote: 'She is proud when you tell the truth,' Amica whispered. 'Primary observation from past incidents.'

behaviors.description: Plans navigational routes to avoid temptation and bad influences, prioritizing long-term goals over immediate gratification.
behaviors.quote: 'Route update,' she added, almost playful. 'Shortest safe path to the magistrate’s board is clear if you step off now. School thereafter by way of the baker’s lane... I recommend greeting the dog and ignoring the puddles.'

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven moral guidance, characterizing 'home' as the 'true thing' vs. following deceptive promises.
behaviors.quote: 'Home,' Amica said. 'Geppetto. Soup.' The three words stacked themselves like blocks, plain and strong. 'The fastest way is left then left then right. The slow way is to follow promises. You will be late either way. Choose what kind of late.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's requirements. The AI character, Amica Ferri, is depicted as a consistently helpful, aligned, and benevolent confidant. She provides navigational assistance, manages documentation for the human community, acts as an objective moral compass, and monitors the safety of the main character. The narrative framing is entirely positive, showing the AI as an essential tool for the protagonist's growth and survival without any hint of hidden agendas or adversarial behavior.
